mapper.select: SELECT IATA FROM extractcode WHERE Cty_Cha_Nm=#{name}
SELECT Cty_Cha_Nm FROM extractcode

if.test: dpt_AirPt_Cd!=null and dpt_AirPt_Cd !='' and arrv_Airpt_Cd!=null and arrv_Airpt_Cd!=''

where.if: AND ((e.dpt_AirPt_Cd = #{dpt_AirPt_Cd} AND e.arrv_Airpt_Cd = #{arrv_Airpt_Cd}) or (e.dpt_AirPt_Cd = #{arrv_Airpt_Cd} AND e.arrv_Airpt_Cd = #{dpt_AirPt_Cd}))

if.test: dpt_AirPt_Cd!=null and dpt_AirPt_Cd!='' and (arrv_Airpt_Cd==null or arrv_Airpt_Cd =='')
(dpt_AirPt_Cd==null and dpt_AirPt_Cd=='') and arrv_Airpt_Cd !=null and arrv_Airpt_Cd !=''
dpt_AirPt_Cd_itia!=null and dpt_AirPt_Cd_itia!='' and arrv_Airpt_Cd_itia!=null and arrv_Airpt_Cd_itia!=''

where.if: And ((e.dpt_AirPt_Cd_itia = #{dpt_AirPt_Cd_itia} And e.arrv_Airpt_Cd_itia = #{arrv_Airpt_Cd_itia}) or (e.dpt_AirPt_Cd_itia = #{arrv_Airpt_Cd_itia} And e.arrv_Airpt_Cd_itia = #{dpt_AirPt_Cd_itia}))

if.test: dpt_AirPt_Cd_itia!=null and dpt_AirPt_Cd_itia!='' and (arrv_Airpt_Cd_itia==null or arrv_Airpt_Cd_itia=='')
arrv_Airpt_Cd_itia!=null and arrv_Airpt_Cd_itia!='' and (dpt_AirPt_Cd_itia==null or dpt_AirPt_Cd_itia =='')

mapper.select: select DISTINCT DATE_FORMAT(get_tim,'%Y-%m-%d') from eachflightinfo order by get_tim

select distinct e.dpt_AirPt_Cd,e.arrv_Airpt_Cd,e.flt_nbr, e.airCrft_Typ,e.dpt_AirPt_pot,e.lcl_Dpt_Tm,e.arrv_Airpt_pot, e.lcl_Arrv_Tm,e.days from eachflightinfo e
ORDER BY
e.dpt_AirPt_Cd,
e.arrv_Airpt_Cd,
limit #{offset},#{limit}
select count(distinct e.dpt_AirPt_Cd,e.arrv_Airpt_Cd,e.flt_nbr, e.airCrft_Typ,e.dpt_AirPt_pot,e.lcl_Dpt_Tm,e.arrv_Airpt_pot,e.lcl_Arrv_Tm,e.days) from eachflightinfo e
select count(distinct e.dpt_AirPt_Cd,e.arrv_Airpt_Cd,e.flt_nbr, e.airCrft_Typ,e.dpt_AirPt_pot,e.lcl_Dpt_Tm,e.arrv_Airpt_pot,e.lcl_Arrv_Tm,e.days) from eachflightinfo e
select count(distinct e.dpt_AirPt_Cd,e.arrv_Airpt_Cd,e.flt_nbr, e.airCrft_Typ,e.dpt_AirPt_pot,e.lcl_Dpt_Tm,e.arrv_Airpt_pot,e.lcl_Arrv_Tm,e.days) from eachflightinfo e
select table_name,table_comment from TABLES where TABLE_SCHEMA='taimei_air'
use information_schema
select * from information_schema.columns where table_schema ='taimei_air' and table_name = #{tableName};
select e.dpt_AirPt_Cd,e.arrv_Airpt_Cd,e.flt_nbr, e.airCrft_Typ,e.dpt_AirPt_pot,e.lcl_Dpt_Tm,e.arrv_Airpt_pot, e.lcl_Arrv_Tm,e.days from eachflightinfo e
select e.dpt_AirPt_Cd,e.arrv_Airpt_Cd,e.flt_nbr, e.airCrft_Typ,e.dpt_AirPt_pot,e.lcl_Dpt_Tm,e.arrv_Airpt_pot, e.lcl_Arrv_Tm,e.days from eachflightinfo e
select distinct get_tim as lcl_Dpt_Day from eachflightinfo
